name: CQ.Ext.Updater.defaults
doc: The defaults collection enables customizing the default properties of Updater

configs.name: timeout
configs.doc: Timeout for requests or form posts in seconds (defaults to CQ.REQUEST_TIMEOUT divided by 1000).

props.name: disableCaching
props.doc: True to append a unique parameter to GET requests to disable caching (defaults to false).

props.name: loadScripts
props.doc: True to process scripts by default (defaults to false).

props.name: showLoadIndicator
props.doc: Whether or not to show indicatorText during loading (defaults to true).

props.name: sslBlankUrl
props.doc: Blank page URL to use with SSL file uploads (defaults to CQ.Ext.SSL_SECURE_URL if set, or "javasc...

props.name: timeout
props.doc: Timeout for requests or form posts in seconds (defaults to 30 seconds).
